Uses of Class
mig.core.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    mig.core
    Package Core of the project Murder in GPHY
    mig.view
    Package View of the project Murder in GPHY

    • Uses of Item in mig.core

      Subclasses of Item in mig.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EnigmaItem
      The class EnigmaItem represents all the list of items that we can win answering an Enigma.It uses inheritance from the class Item The items which can be won after an Enigma are : An information (from the class Information) a physical object (from the class PhysicalObject) These two items, Information and PhysicalObject uses inheritance from this class EnigmaItem.
      class  Information
      The class Information represents the informations given by the characters during the game.
      class  Key
      Key is the class that represents a key which can open a lock
      class  PhysicalObject
      The class PhysicalObject represents the physical items given or found by the player.
      Fields in mig.core declared as Item 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Item Enigma.reward
      Reward is the Item gifted if the player has the test.
      Fields in mig.core with type parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Item> Room.clues
      It is the list of items present in the Room This list does not contain null value
      private java.util.ArrayList<Item> Chest.containt
      ArrayList of all items contained in this Chest A chest can contains a maximum of 4 items
